tool.name: SAGA.tin_tools.4
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTIN False isArrayZFIELD False output_data_GRADIENT $output_data_GRADIENT name SAGA.tin_tools.4 TIN $TIN ZFIELD $ZFIELD DEGREE $DEGREE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_GRADIENT $OutputSection_GRADIENT.outputType_GRADIENT transmissionMode_GRADIENT $OutputSection_GRADIENT.transmissionMode_GRADIENT

param.name: TIN
param.label: TIN
param.help: TIN The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: ZFIELD
param.label: Z Values
param.help: Z Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_GRADIENT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_GRADIENT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Calculates the gradient based on the values of each triangle's points.<br/><br/>
